Posts.Content: lynn2161 wrote: Diagnosed with bone mets almost three years after initial Stage 2B breast cancer. . Initial pathology of the bone mets showed HER2 equivacol. FISH test showed HER2 positive. My second opinion doctor ordered the Foundation test. Test came back saying HER2 negative. I have already had 2 treatments consisting of Taxotere, herception, and perjeta, given the original results of HER2 positive. Has anyone had conflicting results on HER2? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: fish test is HER2 positive but Foundation test HER2 negative lynn2161 meg2016

Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2017 04:02AM lynn2161 wrote: Hi there, What test showed HER2 negative if the fish test showed positive?
